snippet.title: Bushido Blade 2 (PS1) gameplay
snippet.description:
Here is a short vid of the story mode in Bushido Blade 2 on the Sony Playstation.

I'm Playing on a PS2 with PS2 texture smoothing on. I also edited out the load screens.
